S04n423:1: atha khalu bhikṣava udayano nāma brāhmaṇo rājñaḥ purohita udāyinaḥ pitā,
S04n423:2: sa pañcamātrairbrāhmaṇaśataiḥ parivṛto hastottare citrānakṣatre rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha-yatkhalu devo jānīyādābharaṇāni kumārāya kriyantāmiti |
S04n423:5: tatra rājñā śuddhodanena pañcamātraiśca śakyaśataiḥ pañcamātrāṇyābharaṇaśatāni kāritānyabhūvan |
S04n423:6: tadyathā-hastābharaṇāni pādābharaṇāni mūrdhābharaṇāni kaṇṭhābharaṇāni mudrikābharaṇāni karṇikāyākeyūrāṇi mekhalāsuvarṇasūtrāṇi kiṅkiṇījālāni ratnajālāni maṇipratyuptāni pādukā nānāratnasamalaṃkṛtā hārāḥ kaṭakā harṣā mukuṭāni |
S04n423:7: kārayitvā ca puṣyanakṣatrayogenānuyuktena te śākyā rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ-hanta deva maṇḍyatāṃ kumāra iti |
S04n423:13: tatra rātrau vinirgatāyāmāditya udite vimalavyūhanāmodyānaṃ tatra bodhisattvo nirgato'bhūt |
S04n423:15: aśītiśca strīsahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma |
S04n423:16: daśa ca kanyāsahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma |
S04n423:17: pañca ca brāhmaṇasahasrāṇi pratyudgamya bodhisattvasya vadanaṃ prekṣante sma |
S04n423:24: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya purato masipiṇḍa upanikṣipto na bhāsati na tapati na virocate,
S04n423:25: evameva tānyābharaṇāni bodhisattvasya kāyaprabhayāspṛṣṭāni na bhāsante na tapanti na virocante sma |
S04n423:26: evaṃ yā yā ābharaṇavikṛtirbodhisattvasya kāya ābadhyate sma,
S04n423:27: sā sā jihmībhavati sma tadyathāpi nāma masipiṇḍaḥ ||
S04n423:28: tatra vimalā nāmodyānadevatā sā audārikamātmabhāvamabhisaṃdarśya purataḥ sthitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanaṃ taṃ ca mahāntaṃ śākyagaṇaṃ gāthābhirabhibhāṣate sma—
S04n423:32: nā bhāsī itaraḥ sa kāñcana prabhasirirahitaḥ ||1 ||
S04n423:35: nā bhāsī na tapī na śobhate na ca prabhavati
S04n423:36: ābhāye sugatasya kāyi no bhavati yatha masiḥ ||2 ||
S04n423:43: apanethā bharaṇā ma heṭhatā abudha budhakaraṃ
S04n423:49: ityuktvā sā devatā bodhisattvaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya tatraivāntaradhāt ||
